column2: "Let's take a break. There's not a lot of time, but we need to make them sweat a little."
"I'm always being led along by him, so it's nice to return the favor."
"Hm? Why am I so invested in what he says?"
"I guess you would you say we have the same interests, even though it was mostly forced on me."
"Not to mention that I guess I owe him, and Maria."
"Otherwise, I wouldn't even bother with all of this. Not to mention, he talks directly in my head."
"That's why before you meet him, I want to make your impression of him as bad as possible, ahead of time."
"It'd be nice that, even if he manages to say something above his class, he gets lightly laughed at for it."
